\w And|strong="H5869"\w* Amnon \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w vexed|strong="H3334"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w fell|strong="H2470"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* sister \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*; \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w seemed|strong="H5869"\w* \w hard|strong="H6381"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* Amnon \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H6213"\w* \w thing|strong="H3972"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w*.

But Amnon \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jonadab|strong="H3122"\w*, \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shimeah|strong="H8093"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w brother|strong="H7453"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jonadab|strong="H3122"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w subtil|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* said \w unto|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*, \w Why|strong="H4069"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, art \w thou|strong="H3602"\w* \w thus|strong="H3602"\w* \w lean|strong="H1800"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w day|strong="H1242"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w day|strong="H1242"\w*? wilt \w thou|strong="H3602"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*? \w And|strong="H1121"\w* Amnon said \w unto|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* love \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w*, \w my|strong="H5046"\w* brother Absalom’s sister.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jonadab|strong="H3082"\w* said \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* feign thyself \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* father cometh \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*, say \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* sister \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w give|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w eat|strong="H1262"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w dress|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w eat|strong="H1262"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pan|strong="H4958"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*; \w but|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* eat. \w And|strong="H6440"\w* Amnon \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, \w Have|strong="H3605"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*. \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2388"\w* \w when|strong="H7901"\w* \w she|strong="H5973"\w* had \w brought|strong="H5066"\w* \w them|strong="H2388"\w* \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w unto|strong="H5066"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w to|strong="H5066"\w* eat, he \w took|strong="H2388"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H2388"\w* \w her|strong="H7901"\w*, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* said \w unto|strong="H5066"\w* \w her|strong="H7901"\w*, \w Come|strong="H5066"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, \w my|strong="H2388"\w* sister.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* answered \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, \w Nay|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H6213"\w* brother, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w force|strong="H6031"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w such|strong="H3651"\w* \w thing|strong="H5039"\w* \w ought|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w folly|strong="H5039"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, whither \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w carry|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w shame|strong="H2781"\w*? \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thee|strong="H4994"\w*, \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fools|strong="H5036"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H4994"\w*, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w withhold|strong="H4513"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w thee|strong="H4994"\w*.

Howbeit \w he|strong="H4480"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w her|strong="H6031"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* being \w stronger|strong="H2388"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w she|strong="H7901"\w*, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w forced|strong="H6031"\w* \w her|strong="H6031"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H7901"\w* \w her|strong="H6031"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* Amnon \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w her|strong="H8130"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w* wherewith \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w her|strong="H8130"\w* \w was|strong="H3966"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w than|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* love wherewith \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* loved \w her|strong="H8130"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* Amnon said \w unto|strong="H3212"\w* \w her|strong="H8130"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w be|strong="H8130"\w* \w gone|strong="H3212"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w she|strong="H2063"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, \w because|strong="H5973"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w putting|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w is|strong="H7451"\w* \add worse \add*\w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w other|strong="H2063"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* Absalom \w her|strong="H7896"\w* brother \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w unto|strong="H1697"\w* \w her|strong="H7896"\w*, \w Hath|strong="H1697"\w* Amnon \w thy|strong="H7896"\w* brother \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee? \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w hold|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H7896"\w* \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* sister: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w thy|strong="H7896"\w* brother; \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8076"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w her|strong="H7896"\w* brother Absalom’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H8085"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w wroth|strong="H2734"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1697"\w* Absalom \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* Amnon \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Absalom \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* Amnon, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w forced|strong="H6031"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* sister \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w*.
